poem:
Title: "In the Currency of Current Affairs"

Upon the morning paper's jargon soar,
as JP sings Labour's encore.
Sterling scaling 22 month peaks,
whispers of summer in Greek Isles speak.
Whilst afar, the euro slides in election's wake,
yielding the beach recliner's stake.
Yet one must pass the checkpoint's test,
before the pound can accomplish its continental quest.
